idea:
Bizexcel Solutions is an India’s thriving online business services platform and provides one-stop solution for business or entrepreneur to start a business, to maintain accounts & compliance, to grow business through Digital marketing, marketing research, website development, Brand management, to outsource or captive solutions, licensing & certifications like GST, PT, ISO, MSME etc.
We also provide business consulting & coaching services to maximize your potential to scale the business.
Our offerings also include ready-made templates for HR, Account & Taxation, Legal & compliance, Marketing etc at very affordable price.

idea:
We are a registered Section 8 Non-profit Company under the ministry of corporate affairs and Niti Ayog. We are a Chamber of Commerce and our vision is to create an inclusive and safe business ecosystem for the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, intersex, and queer (LGBTIQ+) people in India.

We believe that if marginalized populations are given economic access and opportunity, they become an intrinsic part of the economy. Social inclusion follows economic inclusion.

We drive economic inclusion by working together with corporates, government institutions, and our target beneficiaries ie. the LGBTIQ+ population of India. We have partnerships across 145 countries and have done more than 20 events since our incorporation in November 2020, ranging from capacity building of the LGBTIQ+ community, small business incubation, advocacy, sensitization, policy consulting, etc.
name: SAMAVESH CHAMBER OF COMMERCE

idea:
Medu is India’s first online training platform based in Mumbai, India. We offer skill and development training programs to the healthcare professionals across the globe in order to improve their work efficiency.

Medu is a sister company of Hospaccx Healthcare Business Consultancy Private Ltd- A leading and an oldest consultancy firm providing an array of services for various healthcare settings globally.

Medu aims to bridge the gap in the healthcare industry by providing comprehensive, modern and industry recognized training for all healthcare professionals.
